vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.6.46;
son of: Bani (H1137H);
father of: Hilkiah (H2518I)
§ Amzi = "my strength"
1) a Levite
2) the ancestor of a returned exile in the priestly line
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Baní; ancestro de Etán; tribu de Leví; (b)   hijo de Zacarías; ancestro de Adaías, sacerdote; tribu de Leví
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
暗西（或暗洗） 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我的力量"
1) 一個利未人 #代上 6:46|
2) 被擄歸回的祭司家族的祖先 #尼 11:12|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
暗西（或暗洗） 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我的力量"
1) 一个利未人 #代上 6:46|
2) 被掳归回的祭司家族的祖先 #尼 11:12|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.12;
son of: Zechariah (H2148X);
father of: Pelaliah (H6421)
§ Amzi = "my strength"
1) a Levite
2) the ancestor of a returned exile in the priestly line
